archimate:Device.name: High-Performance Monitor (HPM)
archimate:Device.documentation:
Intended Use:
• Radiology, Laboratory.
Specifications:
• Screen Size: 32 inches • Resolution: 4K UHD (3840x2160) minimum, high pixel density for medical imaging. Full DICOM Part 14 Compliance . HDR Support & 1000-ni. • Panel Type: IPS with high color accuracy (99% sRGB or higher) and anti-reflective coating • Aspect Ratio: 16:9 or 16:10 • Refresh Rate: 75–120 Hz for Faster • Connectivity Options: HDMI 2.1, DisplayPort, Thunderbolt/USB-C, Wireless • Adjustability: Height, tilt, swivel, pivot, VESA mount compatible • Calibration and Certifications: Factory-calibrated color accuracy, medical-imaging compliance (DICOM standard for radiology) • Eye Comfort Features: Advanced blue-light reduction, flicker-free technology • Protective Equipment: Durable screen shield, stable heavy-duty mount or stand
